::Vamprah::

Vamprah had to do  big sforce to hold a curse while she moved again. 
Two were inside and NOT ONE!!!!!

She could face them but she couldn't win... What should she do?...

Her memories gave her the answered... an old advice of a old 
transformer who survived the Great War: "If ya're ready to live will 
die.. but if you're ready to die, you could have a chance to survive."

"I'm ready to fight and  die" she though. She should be moving until 
she find out the way to scape of that mosusetrap that Darkfate had 
put in


-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> Sees where Devilduer is pointing and fires a small venom dart, 
hoping 
> to hit Vamprah and knock her out.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > Vamprah, DevilDuer wasn't wearing night vision goggles, he was 
> using 
> > scanners.
> > 
> > ::DevilDuer::
> > 
> > DevilDuer swears, stepping back as Vamprah glided at him, and 
> > tripping and falling over something. He jumps to his feet, 
hearing 
> > Diamond's voice.
> > 
> > "I have no idea," he says, his scanners getting another lock on 
> > Vamprah a second later, "Yes I do, right over there."
> > 
> > He fires his stun gun again, the beam lighting up the room as it 
> > heads for Vamprah.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > Diamond::
> > > 
> > > She finally cut through the vent and dropped from the ceiling. 
> She 
> > > stood up and looked around. "Where is she?"
